flawed_nl_solution:
The mother is 41 years old now, so 5 years ago she was 41-5=<<41-5=36>>36 years old
At that time the daughter's age was half hers so the daughter was 36/2=<<36/2=18>>18 years old
Now (5 years after that time) the daughter is 18+5=25 years old
In 3 years, the daughter will be 25+3=<<25+3=28>>28 years old
#### 28

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 23, not 25. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
